## Fitting multispecies models

- Multispecies trait models (MSTMs; [Pollock etal, 2012](http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/j.1600-0587.2011.07085.x/abstract))
- Joint Species Distribution Models (JSDMs; [Pollock etal, 2014](http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/2041-210X.12180/full))

## The eucs dataset
```{r, echo = FALSE}
data("eucs", package = "msmod")
DT::datatable(eucs)
```
